mapper.select: SELECT sc.class_name, ss.subject_id, ss.subject_name, MIN(st.score) AS min_score, MAX(st.score)AS max_score, AVG(st.score) AS avg_score , COUNT(st.score) AS actually_come, COUNT(*) - COUNT(st.score) AS not_come FROM class_subject_info AS cs LEFT JOIN school_class AS sc ON cs.class_id = sc.class_id LEFT JOIN school_subject AS ss ON cs.subject_id = ss.subject_id LEFT JOIN student_score AS st ON ss.subject_id = st.school_subject_id WHERE sc.class_headmaster_id = #{headmasterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND sc.state != '0' GROUP BY subject_id;

SELECT sc.class_id, sc.class_name, ss.subject_id, ss.subject_name, MIN(st.score) AS min_score, MAX(st.score)AS max_score, AVG(st.score) AS avg_score, COUNT(st.score) AS actually_come, (COUNT(*) - COUNT(st.score)) AS not_come FROM class_subject_info AS cs LEFT JOIN school_class AS sc ON cs.class_id = sc.class_id LEFT JOIN school_subject AS ss ON cs.subject_id = ss.subject_id LEFT JOIN student_score AS st ON ss.subject_id = st.school_subject_id WHERE cs.admin_info_id = #{adminInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND sc.state != '0' GROUP BY subject_id;

SELECT sc.class_id, sc.class_name, ss.subject_id, ss.subject_name, MIN(st.score) AS min_score, MAX(st.score)AS max_score, AVG(st.score) AS avg_score, COUNT(st.score) AS actually_come, (COUNT(*) - COUNT(st.score)) AS not_come FROM class_subject_info AS cs LEFT JOIN school_class AS sc ON cs.class_id = sc.class_id LEFT JOIN school_subject AS ss ON cs.subject_id = ss.subject_id LEFT JOIN student_score AS st ON ss.subject_id = st.school_subject_id LEFT JOIN school_period_class_thetime AS sp ON cs.class_id = sp.class_id WHERE sc.class_period_id = #{info.periodId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND sp.thetime = #{info.thetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND sc.state != '0' GROUP BY subject_id;
